channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- GlassFish Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- GlassFish Server

item.title: CVE-2017-3626|2024-10-07T16:08:21.869Z -- oracle%20corporation -- glassfish%20server
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle GlassFish Server component of Oracle Fusion Middleware (subcomponent: Java Server Faces). The supported version that is affected is 3.1.2. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Oracle GlassFish Server. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle GlassFish Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
